data.title: EEE Olympiad by BUBT EEE Club

details.description:
EEE Club of Bangladesh University of Business & Technology (BUBT) is going to organize EEE Olympiad to commemorate the contribution of Electrical and Electronic Engineering when the whole world has come to a standstill in this corona pandemic. All EEE students from all over the world can participate in it. Registration is absolutely free.
 
Registration link: https://forms.gle/7Wj8D8zcbd7oKkiGA
Last time of registration: 1st May 2021
Exam Schedule: 11:00 AM-12.00 PM, 6th May 2021
Test duration: 1 Hour (60 Minutes)
Question Type: Google Form (MCQ)
 
Procedure: Those who will register will be sent a link to the question paper via email before the exam. In due course, the link will be opened for submission. Submission will be closed exactly after an hour (60 Minutes) and no more submissions are acceptable after due time.
 
There are attractive prizes for the 3 best performers in the Olympiad. Moreover, there is an e-Certificate that will be sent via registered e-mail to all participants.
 
Then what are you waiting for? Do not miss the chance to show your talent. Get yourself registered following the link ASAP.
 
For any event-related issues- Contact:
01795739983
01580330136
BUBT EEE Club, BUBT
 
For Event Update follow the following Facebook Page: https://www.facebook.com/EEE-Olympiad-by-BUBT-EEE-Club-106144994865634
You may also mail us at bubteeeclub@gmail.com
